abstract: Mark Zuckerberg admits mistakes in the introduction of the Facebook platform last year.
snippet: Mark Zuckerberg admits mistakes in the introduction of the Facebook platform last year.
lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s chief executive, is wearing not flip-flops but regular shoes, and what appears to be — hold the front page tonight, guys – a good old-fashioned hooded sweater.

headline.main: Live From Facebook Founder’s Conference Keynote
